# function: region_cli_name

Gets the Azure CLI name for a region. 
This function takes a region name in any format (full name, short name, or CLI name) and returns the CLI name.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
region_cli_name(region string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `region` (String) Region full name (e.g. 'West US 2'), short name (e.g. 'wus2'), or CLI name (e.g. 'westus2')
